member.name: WS_HEAP_PROPERTY_ID
member.summary: Each heap property is identified by an ID and has an associated value.

member.name: WS_HEAP_PROPERTY_ID.WS_HEAP_PROPERTY_MAX_SIZE
member.summary: Used with . Returns the total number of bytes that can be allocated from the heap. The total number of bytes is defined as sum of the sizes passed in all the calls to since the heap was created / reset.

member.name: WS_HEAP_PROPERTY_ID.WS_HEAP_PROPERTY_TRIM_SIZE
member.summary:
Used with .
Returns the maximum number of bytes of memory that the heap will retain after a call to call. This should be treated an approximate value due to heap overhead. If the trim size is larger than the max size, then the size of the heap will not be trimmed.

member.name: WS_HEAP_PROPERTY_ID.WS_HEAP_PROPERTY_REQUESTED_SIZE
member.summary: Used with . Returns the current total number of bytes requested from the heap since the heap was created/reset.

member.name: WS_HEAP_PROPERTY_ID.WS_HEAP_PROPERTY_ACTUAL_SIZE
member.summary: Used with . Returns the current total number of bytes that the WS_HEAP has allocated from the operating system for purposes of providing allocations.
